author: Carrie Arnold
title: New York City’s coronavirus outbreak is already overwhelming hospitals
description: New York City is the epicentre of the coronavirus outbreak in the US and hospitals are already struggling to treat everyone with covid-19, though the outbreak may not peak for three weeks
content:
By Carrie Arnold
In New York City, the Javits Center convention hall has been converted to a temporary field hospital to help ease the burden on hospitals overwhelmed by treating people with covid-19
John Lamparski/Getty Images
